title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT
excerpt: We have custom softwares that will help to grow your business 100 time faster!
introTitle: Find out the best software services

introText.heading: Mitech specializes in technological and IT-related services such as product engineering, warranty management, building cloud, infrastructure, network, etc.
introText.text:
We’re available for 8 hours a day!
Contact to require a detailed analysis and assessment of your plan.

faq.title: Complete software development
faq.desc: Shouldering complete software development project pipeline or its part to support your business growth.

faq.title: Custom software development
faq.desc: Development of custom enterprise software solutions to address the unique needs of your business.

faq.title: Software product development
faq.desc: Development of SaaS, mobile and desktop applications for marketing and distributing to mass enterprise/consumer users.

faq.title: Software Consultancy
faq.desc: A holistic set of consulting services for both new and ongoing software development projects – from ideation and feasibility study to implementation strategy.

faq.title: Software support and evolution
faq.desc: A broad set of services – help desk & support, cloud migration, legacy reengineering, and more – to keep your business-critical applications healthy and stable.

faq.title: Development team augmentation
faq.desc: More than 20 IT specilists to help you handle the lack of your internal resources and capabilities.

features.title: YOU CAN GET ANY KIND OF SOFTWARE FROM US

items.title: Enterprise resource and process management
items.desc: ERP, Finance, accounting, invoicing and billing, contract management, Sales, Marketing, Inventory management, Project management, HR and talent management etc softwares.

items.title: Digital channels to customers
items.desc: Ecommerce, Customer portals, Advertising, Digital signage, Content management, Video streaming, Customer analytics Etc softwares are available in Xubisoft Ltd.

items.title: Industrial solutions
items.desc: Smart factory, Maintenance, Equipment monitoring, Quality management, Field service, Industrial analytics etc.

items.title: Connected and smart solutions
items.desc: Remote monitoring, Smart factory, Employee monitoring, Connected cars, fleet management, Smart transportation, Smart home

items.title: Emergency and security
items.desc: Emergency response, Information security, Secure communicators and messengers, Secure videoconferencing, Video surveillance.

items.title: Industry-specific software
items.desc: Healthcare, Banking, Telecommunications, Insurance claim management, E-government etc.
